channel.title: Configuration on HoneyTrap
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration on HoneyTrap

item.title: Logging
item.description: Description The logging configuration section in the config file defines the logging backend, needed to view log messages. Syntax [[logging]] output = "" level = "" How many? There needs to be one logging and there can only be one. Arguments in config file There are 2 arguments in a logging config: argument default setting explanation output none Set the output. level none Set the level.

item.title: Filters
item.description: Description The Filter configuration section in the config file defines which data is sent to the channels and which data is filtered. Syntax [[filter]] channel=["console"] How many? There needs to be at least one filter because every channel needs to have a filter config. You can use as many filters as you want. Arguments in config file There are 3 arguments in a filter config: argument default setting explanation channel none Set the list of channels.
